name: CVE-2009-4159
description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the newsletter configuration feature in the backend module in the Direct Mail (direct_mail) extension 2.6.4 and earlier for TYPO3 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:ivan_kartolo:direct_mail:2.1.5:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:ivan_kartolo:direct_mail:2.1.2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:ivan_kartolo:direct_mail:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:ivan_kartolo:direct_mail:2.0.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:ivan_kartolo:direct_mail:2.5.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:ivan_kartolo:direct_mail:2.6.2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:ivan_kartolo:direct_mail:2.6.3:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:ivan_kartolo:direct_mail:2.0.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:ivan_kartolo:direct_mail:2.6.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:ivan_kartolo:direct_mail:2.6.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:ivan_kartolo:direct_mail:2.1.4:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:ivan_kartolo:direct_mail:2.1.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:typo3:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]
